Developer Terms of Use
des:
In order to use this skill you need first create an account at www.suitch.network, and have at least one "Suitch" device such as:
- Suitch smart bulb
- Suitch IR
- Suitch knob
- Suitch outlet
- Suitch Sphir

All the previous devices when connected the first time expose a small WIFI network to allow you to configure them to you local WIFI and thus to the internet. Once you have set the configuration and successfully claim the device in your www.suitch.network account you can move forward to install this Alexa Skill.

In order to pair your www.suitch.network account to your Alexa account, you will require to open your Alexa app and in the skills menu search for "suitch", in the result, select the first option. At the moment of pairing you will be required to sign in with your www.suitch.network account, after a couple of seconds, the Suitch network will allow Alexa to control your devices.

Note for developers:

If you don't have one of our devices, you can create yours using our opensource SDK that you can download when signing in into www.suitch.network.
Suitch is a simple all in one platform, the capabilities of suitch allows users to connect to various protocols for home and industry needs. Some of the stacks supported are ESP8266 with Lua, RTOS C, Arduino, Raspberry and ESP32 ESP-IDF
